Row.Text: At long last we have liberated our cities from foreign rule. It is time for us to unite, to declare ourselves a free and just republic, and establish laws to guide our fledgling nation into the future.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Gran Colombia [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have Liberated a City-State [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must not be at War [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Captured Cities will produce no [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Courthouses will also provide +20% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture

At long last we have liberated our cities from foreign rule. It is time for us to unite, to declare ourselves a free and just republic, and establish laws to guide our fledgling nation into the future.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Captured Cities produce no [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Courthouses will also provide +20% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture
The Congress of Cúcuta was a constituent assembly where Gran Colombia was created. The Congress elected Simón Bolívar and Francisco de Paula Santander president and vice-president, respectively.
This building cannot be constructed but rather facilitates Gran Colombia's unique abilities.

Presidente, your fellow libertadores wish to meet and discuss the future of the region and whether or not our newly independent neighbors should join our great nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Gran Colombia [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 1 City-State Ally [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 1 Libertador [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 Libertador will be lost [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your highest [ICON_CITIZEN] Population City-State Ally will be Annexed into your empire [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+15 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all other met City-States

Presidente, your fellow libertadores wish to meet and discuss the future of the region and whether or not our newly independent neighbors should join our great nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your highest [ICON_CITIZEN] Population City-State Ally will be Annexed into your empire [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+15 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all other met City-States
